Articles.Content:
I created a shuttle today that can carry a full 2m orange tank and full 2m half grey tank into a 300km orbit and dock with a station to drop off the fuel. You lose about 400m/s of delta V on final booster separation due to the balancing issues. I am still working on figuring it out, but it isn't that big of a deal. By using all the fuel (including the payload), it can make it to Low Mun Orbit. It costs a total of 550,000 dollars to launch and all the boosters are recoverable.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Wow looks great! Love the tail on the Orbiter.
I have beeen waiting for this for a while
